Search.Statement: SELECT w2_ShopOperator.*, MenuAuthority.menu_authority_name FROM ( SELECT w2_ShopOperator.shop_id, w2_ShopOperator.operator_id, ROW_NUMBER() OVER ( [[ SHOPOPERATOR_SEARCH_ORDER_BY ]] ) AS row_num FROM w2_ShopOperator [[ SHOPOPERATOR_SEARCH_WHERE ]] ) AS RowIndex INNER JOIN w2_ShopOperator ON ( RowIndex.shop_id = w2_ShopOperator.shop_id AND RowIndex.operator_id = w2_ShopOperator.operator_id ) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT w2_MenuAuthority.menu_authority_level, w2_MenuAuthority.menu_authority_name FROM w2_MenuAuthority WHERE w2_MenuAuthority.shop_id = @shop_id AND w2_MenuAuthority.pkg_kbn = @pkg_kbn ) AS MenuAuthority ON ( 1 = 1 --w2_ShopOperator.menu_access_level1★ = MenuAuthority.menu_authority_level <@@hasval:login_operator_menu_access_level1@@> AND w2_ShopOperator.menu_access_level1@ = MenuAuthority.menu_authority_level </@@hasval:login_operator_menu_access_level1@@> <@@hasval:login_operator_menu_access_level2@@> AND w2_ShopOperator.menu_access_level2 = MenuAuthority.menu_authority_level </@@hasval:login_operator_menu_access_level2@@> <@@hasval:login_operator_menu_access_level3@@> AND w2_ShopOperator.menu_access_level3 = MenuAuthority.menu_authority_level </@@hasval:login_operator_menu_access_level3@@> <@@hasval:login_operator_menu_access_level4@@> AND w2_ShopOperator.menu_access_level4 = MenuAuthority.menu_authority_level </@@hasval:login_operator_menu_access_level4@@> ) WHERE @bgn_row_num <= RowIndex.row_num AND RowIndex.row_num <= @end_row_num ORDER BY RowIndex.row_num ASC

Get.Statement: SELECT * FROM w2_ShopOperator WHERE shop_id = @shop_id AND operator_id = @operator_id

GetByLoginId.Statement: SELECT TOP 1 * FROM w2_ShopOperator WHERE shop_id = @shop_id AND login_id = @login_id

GetOperatorList.Statement:
-- 全件数取得 DECLARE @row_count int SELECT @row_count = ISNULL(COUNT(w2_ShopOperator.operator_id), 0) FROM w2_ShopOperator [[ SHOPOPERATOR_SEARCH_WHERE ]]
-- 該当情報取得 SELECT w2_ShopOperator.*, MenuAuthority.*, @row_count AS row_count FROM ( SELECT w2_ShopOperator.shop_id, w2_ShopOperator.operator_id, ROW_NUMBER() OVER ( [[ TAG_AUTHORITY_SHOPOPERATOR_SEARCH_ORDER_BY ]] ) AS row_num FROM w2_ShopOperator [[ SHOPOPERATOR_SEARCH_WHERE ]] ) AS RowIndex INNER JOIN w2_ShopOperator ON ( RowIndex.shop_id = w2_ShopOperator.shop_id AND RowIndex.operator_id = w2_ShopOperator.operator_id ) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT w2_MenuAuthority.menu_authority_level, w2_MenuAuthority.menu_authority_name FROM w2_MenuAuthority WHERE w2_MenuAuthority.pkg_kbn = '2' -- w2MarketingPlanner AND w2_MenuAuthority.shop_id = @shop_id ) AS MenuAuthority ON ( w2_ShopOperator.menu_access_level2 = MenuAuthority.menu_authority_level ) WHERE @bgn_row_num <= RowIndex.row_num AND RowIndex.row_num <= @end_row_num ORDER BY RowIndex.row_num ASC

GetOperatorListWithTagID.Statement: -- 該当情報取得 SELECT usable_affiliate_tag_ids_in_report, operator_id, name FROM w2_ShopOperator WHERE DATALENGTH(usable_affiliate_tag_ids_in_report) > 0

GetEcOperatorList.Statement:
-- 全件数取得 DECLARE @row_count int SELECT @row_count = ISNULL(COUNT(w2_ShopOperator.operator_id), 0) FROM w2_ShopOperator [[ EC_SHOPOPERATOR_SEARCH_WHERE ]]
-- 該当情報取得 SELECT w2_ShopOperator.*, MenuAuthority.menu_authority_name, @row_count AS row_count FROM ( SELECT w2_ShopOperator.shop_id, w2_ShopOperator.operator_id, ROW_NUMBER() OVER ( [[ SHOPOPERATOR_SEARCH_ORDER_BY ]] ) AS row_num FROM w2_ShopOperator [[ EC_SHOPOPERATOR_SEARCH_WHERE ]] ) AS RowIndex INNER JOIN w2_ShopOperator ON ( RowIndex.shop_id = w2_ShopOperator.shop_id AND RowIndex.operator_id = w2_ShopOperator.operator_id ) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT w2_MenuAuthority.menu_authority_level, w2_MenuAuthority.menu_authority_name FROM w2_MenuAuthority WHERE w2_MenuAuthority.pkg_kbn = '1' -- w2MarketingPlanner AND w2_MenuAuthority.shop_id = @shop_id ) AS MenuAuthority ON ( w2_ShopOperator.menu_access_level1 = MenuAuthority.menu_authority_level ) WHERE @bgn_row_num <= RowIndex.row_num AND RowIndex.row_num <= @end_row_num ORDER BY RowIndex.row_num ASC

Update.Statement: UPDATE w2_ShopOperator SET name = @name, <@@hasval:mail_addr@@> mail_addr = @mail_addr, </@@hasval:mail_addr@@> menu_access_level1 = @menu_access_level1, menu_access_level2 = @menu_access_level2, menu_access_level3 = @menu_access_level3, menu_access_level4 = @menu_access_level4, menu_access_level5 = @menu_access_level5, menu_access_level6 = @menu_access_level6, menu_access_level7 = @menu_access_level7, menu_access_level8 = @menu_access_level8, menu_access_level9 = @menu_access_level9, menu_access_level10 = @menu_access_level10, login_id = @login_id, password = @password, odbc_user_name = @odbc_user_name, odbc_password = @odbc_password, valid_flg = @valid_flg, del_flg = @del_flg, date_changed = GETDATE(), last_changed = @last_changed WHERE shop_id = @shop_id AND operator_id = @operator_id

UpdateOperatorAdvAuthority.Statement: UPDATE w2_ShopOperator SET usable_advcode_nos_in_report = @usable_advcode_nos_in_report, date_changed = GETDATE(), last_changed = @last_changed WHERE shop_id = @shop_id AND operator_id = @operator_id

Delete.Statement: DELETE w2_ShopOperator WHERE shop_id = @shop_id AND operator_id = @operator_id

UpdateOperatorTagAuthority.Statement: UPDATE w2_ShopOperator SET w2_ShopOperator.usable_affiliate_tag_ids_in_report = @usable_affiliate_tag_ids_in_report, w2_ShopOperator.usable_advcode_media_type_ids = @usable_advcode_media_type_ids, w2_ShopOperator.usable_output_locations = @usable_output_locations, w2_ShopOperator.date_changed = GETDATE(), w2_ShopOperator.last_changed = @last_changed WHERE w2_ShopOperator.shop_id = @shop_id AND w2_ShopOperator.operator_id = @operator_id

UpdateAuthenticationCode.Statement: UPDATE w2_ShopOperator SET w2_ShopOperator.authentication_code = @authentication_code, w2_ShopOperator.date_code_send = GETDATE() WHERE w2_ShopOperator.shop_id = @shop_id AND w2_ShopOperator.login_id = @login_id

UpdateRemoteAddress.Statement: UPDATE w2_ShopOperator SET w2_ShopOperator.remote_addr = @remote_addr, w2_ShopOperator.date_last_loggedin = GETDATE() WHERE w2_ShopOperator.shop_id = @shop_id AND w2_ShopOperator.login_id = @login_id

GetShopOperatorMasterAndRealShopId.Statement: SELECT @@ fields @@ FROM w2_ShopOperator [[ SHOPOPERATOR_SEARCH_WHERE ]] [[ SHOPOPERATOR_SEARCH_ORDER_BY ]]

CheckOperatorFields.Statement: SELECT TOP 1 @@ fields @@ FROM w2_ShopOperator,w2_OperatorAuthority WHERE w2_ShopOperator.shop_id = w2_OperatorAuthority.shop_id AND w2_ShopOperator.operator_id = w2_OperatorAuthority.operator_id
